analysis.key_quote: Dismantling the protections of the civil service will and already is disincentivizing the best and brightest from serving our country.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the dismantling of civil service protections, which aligns with merit-based system concerns and due process rights. Additionally, it expresses distrust regarding the potential for politicization and misuse of authority, further indicating opposition to the rule.
